name: Yash Patel
about: I am a software engineer highly skilled at creating scalable solutions. Offering indepth knowledge of Spring Framework and Advanced web-design. Background writing code and developing systems for web-based SAAS applications.

education.university: Madhav Institute of Technology and Science

roles: Work on development, enhancements, and operation of web based software services as a full-stack web developer within a dedicated, produst based system
Participate in specification, design, implementation and support of the product, as well as improve existing features and product performance.
Integrate, design and optimize scalable API solutions for the service
Designed and developed a flexible web-portal for supporting local businesses
Programmed a mobile application (similar to Pokemon Go) for engaging users for web-portal
Got a good peak at Angular, SQL, PHP, Objective C

projects.name: O-Shop
projects.discription: A fully functional web store for buying organic products. Designed to keep customer in mind. With ultra responsive webdesign with consistency

projects.name: EZ-Settings
projects.discription: An application made in java swing for easy configuring of OS settings, cache clean and some other advance controls

projects.name: Voice Code
projects.discription: A simple application to auto-type template code on any editor of choice, with voice command using the Artificial Neural network for input voice classification

projects.name: Web To PDF
projects.discription: A python application to dynamically perform web scraping and downloading the webpages in pdf format iteratively visiting the next page if present up to the specified limit

projects.name: Markets API
projects.discription: An API for scraping and returnig current market data and prices. This is a light weight api that uses web-scraping to get data and history. This is built using  Java Spring

projects.name: Smart-pointer
projects.discription: A custom C++ liberary for pointers. This pointer gets destroyed when nothingis pointing at it, this solves the problem of pointer avoiding unnecessary memory leaks.

projects.name: C++ Map Liberary
projects.discription: A custom C++ liberary for maps. This implementation uses the random height skip list with improved lookup performance as the input data scales.

projects.name: Sudoku Solver
projects.discription: A fun simple app to generate and solve sudoku puzzels.

projects.name: Distributed-Hash-table
projects.discription: A multi server hash table is made using Java and Apache Thrift as Interface Defination Language(IDL). This represents the scalable DB model similar to AWS

projects.name: CPU Pipeline Simulator
projects.discription: The code reads the Assembly instructions and simulated the working of a scalar CPU with a five stage pipeline, instruction squashing and multi layer Arithmetic Logic Unit(ALU).
